main.name: Shailesh Joshi
main.description: I love progreamming and build good Web App, Web Products and Apps
main.bio: Hi there! I am Shailesh! I am running a small website development company in India, but my passion is about learning leatest technologies and trends, I teah studenst locally and provide them work if they need. I have 13+ years of working experience on Website App, Products and Mobile App developments, throughout my career I have worked on small to large and easy to complex level projects also leads team of 10+ people on some projects, I have now knowldge about better user engagement and user experience.
main.contactmessage: Get in touch with me to solve your problem or build your products!

resume.skillmessage: I code becuase I love it and it gives me happiness

work.title: Founder and CEO
work.description: Providing Website Development Service and empowering IT agencies by providing dadicated resources

testimonials.text: Shailesh provided us with web development services for 6 years. In that time he worked on a number of projects, including large scale changes to our 4 websites along with app development and multiple payment systems. I was very pleased with the work he did for us and he always responded quickly if any issues arose, often working out of hours to make sure our systems were running smoothly. You'll be in good hands with Vital Technolabs.
